column4: hi all - i have a networking question. i have a 5-port switch and i'm trying to set a static ip on my ubuntu box so i can connect to it from my laptop
unfortunately my laptop can't ping the ubuntu box
The laptop and the ubuntu box both must have static IP addresses
both of them? okay, i'll try that
the laptop is win7, so i'll have to monkey around a bit :)
yes, the packets know where the server is, they do not know where the laptop is without a valid IP
Just to be clear, what IP does the server have?
k, what IP does the laptop have?
Oh well if you have dhcp than that's fine.
it's one of two interfaces, the other is the wireless
the weird thing i'm doing is that there's no router in the setup
you're going to have to lay out the entire network for me to fully understand what's happening.  PM me :)
sure, i'm a bit of an irc noob so how do i start it?
every client is different.  Click my name? right click my name?
